high_descs: pick up the cd that is on the table
move to face the lamp, hold cd up
Turn right and walk to the dresser on the left.
Pick up the CD on the dresser.
anns.task_desc: Look at a CD by the light of a lamp.

high_descs: Turn to the right, walk to the nightstand
Pick up the CD from the nightstand
Take one step to the right, in front of the lamp
Turn on the lamp on the nightstand
anns.task_desc: Turn on lamp to see the cd
